alert.note: Alert for Waupaca; Waushara (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 26 at 5:26AM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of eastern Waushara and southwestern Waupaca Counties through 630 AM CDT... At 526 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Wisconsin Rapids to 12 miles northeast of Friendship to near Wisconsin Dells. Movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Redgranite around 600 AM CDT. Hartman Creek State Park around 605 AM CDT. Chain O` Lakes-King around 610 AM CDT. Waupaca around 615 AM CDT. Fremont around 630 AM CDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include Rural, Saxeville, Lind Center, Mount Morris, Auroraville, Borth, Sheridan, Silver Lake, Spring Lake and Lohrville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
